ATV - Google Account: login (/sdcard/goo.SYNTAX: su -c 'am force-stop com.nianticlabs.pokemongo && sleep 6 && am start -a android.settings.ADD_ACCOUNT_SETTINGS && sleep 4 && input keyevent 20 && input keyevent 20 && sleep 1 && input keyevent 66 && sleep 1 && input text "$(sed -n 1p /sdcard/google-account)" && sleep 1 && input keyevent 66 && sleep 1 && input text "$(sed -n 2p /sdcard/google-account)" && sleep 1 && input keyevent 66' && echo OK
